result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael J Edelman in court with attorney Kathilynne A. Grotelueschen.  Estee Elizabeth Scholtz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Upon motion of the State case is dismissed and read-in. Minutes filed.
Application for Jail Time Credit form
Subpoena - LLH
Subpoena - DTR
Subpoena - NTK

Subpoena RK (Racine County Sheriff)
DA Service Fees - $75.00
Subpoena - SR

Defendant Michael J Edelman in court with attorney Ashley Renz for Attorney Kathilynne A Grotelueschen.  Diane M Donohoo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Defendant's other cases, 2013CF000486 and 2013TR4015/4016 had been scheduled for Trial on August 4 and 5, 2014 with a Final pre-trial on July 30, 2014.  The State is requesting a reset of that Trial due to unavailable of the State's witness.  Court advises parties that effective May 1st, there will be a reassignment of caseload.  All felony traffic files will be assigned to the Misdemeanor Traffic Court.  The Clerk will forward Mr. Edelman's files to the Calendar Clerk for Judge Carlson to reschedule the Defendant's cases.  Minutes filed.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.  Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
Not guilty plea and trial reserved.

Defendant Michael J Edelman in court with attorney Kathilynne Grotelueschen.  Haley J Rea appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant wishes to waive his prelminary hearing. Court goes over waiver form with the defendant. Information filed. Reading waived.  Status conference scheduled for April 30, 2014 at 02:30 pm.
Signed bond filed with the court.

Defendant Michael J Edelman in court with attorney Kathilynne Grotelueschen.  Diane Donohoo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 21, 2014 at 03:00 pm.
See signature bond set 02-05-2014.

**AMENDED 02-05-2014**  TOTAL BOND COVERS 13CF00486 AND 14CF00032.  MUST POST 800.00 CASH. Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol.  Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S):  NO CONTACT WITH A.P. OR M.P. OR WITNESS K.L.  Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.
